product_name: 2022 foreign trade Men's Chinese style loose tether cotton and linen shorts breathable casual pants wholesale

analysis_logic.category_context: Category hierarchy: Menswear -> Men's Casual Pants. This indicates clothing apparel (shorts/pants). Expected physical envelope: Length 30-50cm (garment length), Width 30-50cm (waist width when flat), Height 2-5cm (folded thickness), Weight 150-400g (lightweight cotton/linen fabric).
analysis_logic.sku_differentiation: Single SKU with cosmetic attributes only (Color: Khaki, Size: M). No physical variance expected between color variants. Size 'M' is standard medium, should align with typical men's shorts dimensions.
analysis_logic.unit_prediction: Input values detected: Length=150, Width=115, Height=115, Weight=5000.15. Analysis: 150mm = 15cm (reasonable garment length for shorts), 115mm = 11.5cm (too small for width/height of folded garment - likely packaging dimensions in MM). Weight 5000.15g = 5kg is impossibly heavy for cotton/linen shorts (typical weight 200-350g). Unit error detected: Weight likely in grams but decimal misplaced (should be 500.015g or input error), or dimensions are in MM.
analysis_logic.correction_reasoning: Corrected dimensions from MM to CM: 15cm length (short for shorts, likely compressed measurement), 11.5cm width/height (packaging dimensions). Weight corrected from 5000.15g to 250g (average for cotton/linen men's shorts size M). Original weight value rejected as physically impossible - a 5kg pair of shorts would require metal reinforcement. Applied category baseline for lightweight summer shorts.

validated_skus.sku_note: Dimensions converted from MM to CM. Weight corrected from impossible 5000.15g to category baseline 250g for cotton/linen shorts.
